Zapier Remote Product Analyst Internship 2026

Remote internship analyzing user journeys and automation product metrics at Zapier.

CompanyZapier
RoleProduct Analyst Intern
LocationRemote
Duration12 weeks
StipendPaid; competitive remote stipend (Expected/Indicative)
Work HoursFull-time remote
Employment TypeIntern
ExperienceSQL and product analytics exposure

Eligibility & Skills

  • Students/new grads comfortable with SQL, dashboards, and async communication
  • Education: UG/PG in CS/IT/Math/Stats/Business analytics
  • Branches allowed: Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics
  • Skills: SQL, Product metrics, Experimentation basics, BI tools
  • Year of study: Pre-final/final year or recent grads
  • Age limit: Per company policy

Zapier Remote Product Analyst Internship 2026

Introduction

Zapier is remote-first. This internship focuses on product analytics for automation flows. Dates/stipend are Expected/Indicative.

Program Overview

  • Analyze funnels, retention, and automation usage
  • Build dashboards, partner with PM/Eng
  • Paid monthly; remote onboarding

Eligibility

  • SQL proficiency and BI tool experience
  • Comfortable working async across time zones

How to Apply

Apply on Zapier careers with CV/portfolio; expect SQL/analytics task and remote interview loops.

FAQs

  • Paid? Yes, competitive remote stipend (Expected/Indicative).
  • Remote? 100% remote.
  • Need automation experience? Nice-to-have; product sense and metrics matter.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 20 March 2026.
